author: marioevz
content: Hey all, I'm finishing GetPayloadBodies tests on hive engine api test suite, but I wanted to get a general idea of whether all teams have this already merged or planning on merging soon? What's the general status for this ? Thanks!

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: We have an open pr here: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26232

author: siladu
content:
We have a PR more or less ready: https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/4980 
but need to test with a CL before we merge it, so if any CLs have it ready on master or in a branch please let me know.

content: If you have a docker image I could run the current hive test set
